mapper.select: select user_id, dept_id, login_name, user_name, user_type, email, phonenumber, sex, avatar, password, salt, status, del_flag, login_ip, login_date, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_user where user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
